javax.activity
Class PropertyGroupContext

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.activity.PropertyGroupContext
public class PropertyGroupContext
extends java.lang.Object

The PropertyGroupContext utility object is provided by the Activity service to assist a PropertyGroupManager read and write org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity context data during marshalling and unmarshalling of the org.omg.CosActivity.ActivityContext that incorporates it. Marshaling and unmarshaling occurs at an execution environment boundary when the context needs to be converted to or from the CDR encapsulated form used for remote propagation over IIOP.

Constructor Summary
PropertyGroupContext(java.lang.String propertyGroupName, org.omg.CORBA.Any contextData)
          Creates an instance of a PropertyGroupContext to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure when it is passed to or is to be created from a PropertyGroupManager.
PropertyGroupContext(java.lang.String propertyGroupName, java.io.Serializable contextData)
          Creates an instance of a PropertyGroupContext to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure when it is created by a PropertyGroupManager.

Constructor Detail

PropertyGroupContext

public PropertyGroupContext(java.lang.String propertyGroupName,
                            org.omg.CORBA.Any contextData)
Creates an instance of a PropertyGroupContext to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure when it is passed to or is to be created from a PropertyGroupManager. This constructor may be used by either the Activity service when it is unmarshalling an inbound request or response context or by a PropertyGroupManager when it is marshaling an outbound request or response context.
Parameters:
propertyGroupName - The name of the PropertyGroup that has been received from or is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.property_group_name field of the Activity context.
contextData - A CORBA Any that contains the contextData that has been received from or is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.context_data field of the Activity context. Only the PropertyGroupManager has the knowledge required to understand the structure of the contextData.

PropertyGroupContext

public PropertyGroupContext(java.lang.String propertyGroupName,
                            java.io.Serializable contextData)
Creates an instance of a PropertyGroupContext to hold the contents of the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity structure when it is created by a PropertyGroupManager. This constructor may be used by a PropertyGroupManager when it is marshaling an outbound request or response context in the case where that context can be represented by a java.io.Serializable object.
Parameters:
propertyGroupName - The name of the PropertyGroup that has been received from or is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.property_group_name field of the Activity context.
contextData - A Serializable object that represents the contextData that is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.context_data field of the Activity context. Only the PropertyGroupManager has the knowledge required to understand the structure of the contextData. The constructor creates a org.omg.CORBA.Any to hold this object and uses the Any.insert_Value(java.io.Serializable) method to insert the object.
Method Detail

getPropertyGroupName

public java.lang.String getPropertyGroupName()
Retrieves the propertyGroupName that has been received from or is to be inserted into the PropertyGroupIdentity structure. This method may be called by either the Activity service when it is marshalling an outbound request or response context or by a PropertyGroupManager when it is unmarshaling an inbound request or response context.
Returns:
The name of the PropertyGroup that has been received from or is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.property_group_name field of the Activity context.

getContextDataAny

public org.omg.CORBA.Any getContextDataAny()
Retrieves the contextData that has been received from or is to be inserted into the PropertyGroupIdentity structure. This method may be called by either the Activity service when it is marshalling an outbound request or response context or by a PropertyGroupManager when it is unmarshaling an inbound request or response context.
Returns:
A CORBA Any that contains the contextData that has been received from or is to be inserted into the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.context_data field of the Activity context. Only the PropertyGroupManager has the knowledge required to understand the structure of the contextData.

getContextDataValue

public java.io.Serializable getContextDataValue()
                                         throws SystemException
Retrieves the contextData that has been received from a PropertyGroupIdentity structure. This method may be called by a PropertyGroupManager when it is unmarshaling an inbound request or response context in the case where that context can be represented by a java.io.Serializable object.
Returns:
A java.io.Serializable object that represents the contextData that has been received from the org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.context_data field of the Activity context. Only the PropertyGroupManager has the knowledge required to understand the structure of the contextData. If the received context_data is not a Serializable object, this method throws a SystemException.
Throws:
SystemException - Thrown if the received org.omg.CosActivity.PropertyGroupIdentity.context_data does not have a TypeCode kind of _tk_value. Such context_data should be retrieved using the getContextDataAny method.
